documento.intro: This Cookie Policy describes the different types of cookies that may be applied by Atomico3.io or by third-party organizations on this website or on our mobile application. If you have questions regarding this Cookie Policy, please contact

informacion punto 1.p1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile applications by websites that you visit. They are widely used in order to make websites work, and also to provide organizations some information on you and on your browsing activities.
informacion punto 1.p2: Cookies have several functions, such as allowing you to navigate efficiently on a website or a mobile application, remembering your choices and the goods and services you purchased. Thanks to cookies, we:
informacion punto 1.p2.1: improve the knowledge we have of you and your interests;
informacion punto 1.p2.2: offer you content specifically personalized for you (for example to remember the choice of language you have made on our site, or to show you advertisements that are tailored to your needs and interest)
informacion punto 1.p3: When we talk about 'cookies' we are also talking about technologies similar to cookies, such as scripts, web beacons, pixels, fingerprinting and redirects. Scripts (sometimes called tags) are programs that run in your browser or mobile application and perform various actions, such as sending information to our servers.
informacion punto 1.p4: Cookies can be implemented by us and also by third-party organizations.

informacion punto 2.p1: Cookies allow us to collect personal data relating to you, and to transmit us technical information about the devices you use, the clicks you make, and the content you view. We combine this information with personal data that you have already provided us or that we have obtained from external sources (see our
informacion punto 2.p2: The cookies we place on your terminal give us access to the following personal data relating to you:
informacion punto 2.p2.1: Identifiers of the equipment you use (IP address of your computer, Android identifier, Apple identifier, etc.);
informacion punto 2.p2.2: Type of operating system used by your terminal (Microsoft Windows, Apple Os, Linux, Unix, etc.);
informacion punto 2.p2.3: Type and version of the browser software used by your terminal (Microsoft Internet Explorer, Apple Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, etc.);
informacion punto 2.p2.4: Dates and times of connection to our services;
informacion punto 2.p2.5: Address of the originating Internet page ('referrer');
informacion punto 2.p2.6: Browsing data on our services, content viewed;
informacion punto 2.p2.7: Information relating to your use of our sites and applications;
informacion punto 2.p2.8: Information relating to the presence of cookies on your terminal, the time and date of viewing; a page, and a description of the page where the web beacon is placed;
informacion punto 2.p2.9: Information on whether or not you read emails that we send you, on the clicks you make on the links contained in these emails.

informacion punto 3.p1: Yes and no. Some cookies are necessary for our site to function ('Essential Cookies'). However, for others, your consent is collected before the cookies are implemented on your terminal.
informacion punto 3.p2: Essential Cookies allow our website/mobile applications to function. Without them, your user experience would be degraded. The Essential Cookies that we implement without your consent are the following:
informacion punto 3.p2.1: Cookies recording the choice you have expressed on the implementation of cookies;
informacion punto 3.p2.2: Cookies used for authentication purposes and for ensuring the security of our authentication mechanism;
informacion punto 3.p2.3: Cookies used for personalization of our user interface (choice of language, or presentation of our service), when such personalization is essential to provide you with our service;
informacion punto 3.p2.4: Cookies allowing you to automatically login into your account, using identifiers or data that you have previously entrusted to us;
informacion punto 3.p2.5: Cookies allowing us to ensure that the display of our content is suitable for your device;
informacion punto 3.p2.6: Cookies to remember your subscription to our newsletters.
